TITLE: The national ban on evictions expires today. Here's who's most at risk
SUMMARY: A historic wave of evictions could be coming. Most at risk are people of color, single mothers and those who haven't been vaccinated yet.

TITLE: Here's everything you need to know about applying for federal rental assistance
SUMMARY: Renters will no longer be protected from eviction come August. But there's still time to apply for federal rental assistance.

SUMMARY: You'll need more than your down payment in savings before buying a house. Here are the costs you should plan for in your purchasing budget.

SUMMARY: "We're charging ahead with this. ... We're knocking down walls pretty soon," Realogy CEO Ryan Schneider told CNBC on Thursday.
